body.p: jManage is an evolving open source application management platform. It is easy to add support for more applications which you might want but are not yet supported. We request you contribute any such enhancements back to jManage and help it to become more useful.

td.p:
- JBoss
- Bea Weblogic
- IBM WebSphere
- JDK1.5
- Tomcat
- MX4J
- JMX Remoting (JSR 160)
- Open Cloud Rhino
- Apache Geronimo

- JVM Summary dashboard
- JVM Threads dashboard

- Basic Oracle connector
- Basic SNMP connector
